channel.title: CVE Feed for NodeRedis -- node-redis
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NodeRedis -- node-redis

item.title: CVE-2021-29469|2024-08-03T22:11:05.198Z -- noderedis -- node-redis
item.description: Node-redis is a Node.js Redis client. Before version 3.1.1, when a client is in monitoring mode, the regex begin used to detected monitor messages could cause exponential backtracking on some strings. This issue could lead to a denial of service. The issue is patched in version 3.1.1.
